title: Tasty cottage pie
ingredients: ['400g can vegetable hot pot or stew', '300g can carrots, drained', '250g minced beef', '1 potato, peeled and cut into chunks', '2 sweet potatoes, peeled and cut into chunks', '2 teaspoons whole grain mustard', '1 tablespoon milk', 'A knob of butter', '50g cheddar cheese, grated', '1 tablespoon oil', 'salt and pepper to taste']
